participant_1.background:
I am most afraid of losing my bar, which is my livelihood and my passion.
I'm looking for a place with a big yard for my dog and a garage for my car.
i like to take walks.
i just turned 77.
i am in a rock band.

participant_2.background:
I create art to help me process and cope with my emotions.
I remember my mother making me custom-made shoes when I was a child.
I am not into sports but I am passionate about animal welfare.
i will one day own a ferret.
i wish that i could be an animal.

content.text: I am well! Just finished creating a new painting.
It was a painting of a dog. I am passionate about animal welfare.
That is so kind of you. I am also a big animal lover.
I wish I could be an animal. I think it would be so much fun.
I can see why you would think that. It would be great to have all the freedom of an animal.
I love dogs. They are so loyal and loving.
Me too! I have always had dogs as pets.
I am looking for a place to live with a big yard for my dog.
That sounds like a great idea. Dogs need a lot of space to run around.
I agree. I have a bar that I own, so I need a place that is close to work.
That sounds like a lot of responsibility. Do you enjoy owning a bar?
I do. It is my passion. I have been in the bar business for many years.
That is great. It is always good to do something that you love
